EditorManager Class Reference

Interface that represent the object used to manage the list of editors. Interface used by plugins. The goal is to permit easily access of all existing editors. This class is not a QObject class but the inherited class must emit signal currentChanged(int) when the current editor changed. More...

Detailed Description

Interface that represent the object used to manage the list of editors. Interface used by plugins. The goal is to permit easily access of all existing editors. This class is not a QObject class but the inherited class must emit signal currentChanged(int) when the current editor changed.
